observation: Navigating to https://www.heartbeatdesigns.com/ returned status code 200

thought: The website is live and accessible, so I can proceed with further analysis.
observation: Designed From The Heart…for mother and baby  heartbeatdesigns.com HOME CHARMS A Mother’s Heart Charm My Baby Angel Charm Zuzu’s Bell Charm Designer Testimonials Policies Contact Blog Original & Exclusive Designs Designs for Mom & Baby, pregnancy, birth, adoption, baby showers, premature birth, child loss, Mothers Day…and all occasions for mother and child. aka “ HEARTBEAT DESIGNS are a precious keepsake of great sentimental value to pass down through generations…a treasured family heirloom baby in a heart it is the embodiment of motherhood. a “baby in my heart.” Designed From The Heart… “A design as pure and distinct as a “baby in a heart” is the embodiment of motherhood…” Recent Posts Hi April…Time for Birds to Sing! Hello March…Nice to See You! Hello February… Happy New Year… “A Mothers Heart”© Sweet child of my dreams… ” A Mom’s Lament”© Treasure the moments of motherhood

thought: The website seems to be related to mother and baby products, with no indication of scam characteristics based on the text content.
